Description: dark cherry mystery is the second opening theme (in the TV broadcast, third in the BD release) of the second cour of theÂ Owarimonogatari anime series as the theme of Ougi Dark. It is the seventh opening of the Owarimonogatari anime over all.

#Background.text: The lyrics are made by meg rock (Megumi Hinata). It is composed and arranged by Mito and performed by Kaori Mizuhashi, who voices Ougi Oshino.
